__e: And...yeah, maybe that means we're freaks, but it's worth something -- it's worth the sacrifice.
No, must be all out on the street where the geeks are. Maybe not.
And who kept those geeks going all night long?
I'm so sick... of these freaks... giving us hell.
There must be 200 of them fucking freaks... and any minute now they'll be coming to kick our ass.
